title: Bridging secrets is hard
summary:
Cryptocurrency and privacy don’t fit together as easily as you might expect. Blockchains give you the illusion of privacy via pseudonymization: you don’t put your name on a blockchain, but you do put information on a blockchain that can be used to determine your name. Blockchain analysis can often reveal information that no one intended […]
